TenderNotice.title: Notice Inviting e-Tender

tenderDetails.nameOfWork: Maintenance of Roof and allied Plumbing & Carpentry work at Type IV quarters of NIT Agartala.

TenderNotice.invitedFrom: Central & Public Sector Undertakings and eligible Contractors / Firms / Agencies of appropriate standing, registered with state PWDs / CPWD / MES Railway / P & T or other government organizations.

biddingProcess.instructions: Bidding is online only. Bidders can bid 24x7 until the closing time. Re-submission is allowed, with the latest bid being considered for evaluation. Physical submission of bids is not permitted.

bidOpening.process: Bids will be opened online and will be accessible to bidders through https://eprocure.gov.in. Bidders may be present at the bid opening.

additionalInfo.corrigendumNote: Any subsequent corrigendum will be available on the website only.
